attributes.action: reduce the price of petrol to a level that is within the range of other European Countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Presently there are prices ranging from 1 Euro to 1 Euro 25 within most European countries.  The price does not have such a high amount of taxation against it as with the British Government.  If the price is levied against other European Countries, any taxes lost should not be recovered with invention of a new tax or increase other taxes.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reduce the price of petrol to a level that is within the range of other European Countries"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15343.asp

Prime Minister's Office
